properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 5:13AM CST until February 8 at 12:51AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River near Amory
* until Friday February 07.
* At 04 AM Thursday the stage was 22.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 24.5 feet on Thursday February 06.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Wednesday February 05 and will
continue rising to near 24.5 feet by Thursday February 06. The
river will fall below flood stage Friday February 07.
* At 25.0 feet...Widespread lowland and farm land flooding is
occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued tomorrow or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
